metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'Imprim. de Cl. Simon, imprimeur de M. l'Évêque métropolitain de Paris, rue St.-Jacques, près St.-Yves, no. 27,
metadata.description: Signed, p. 16: Le curé de Saint-Severin, J.C. Leblanc-de-Beaulieu. Le 9 juin 1792, l'an 4. de la liberté

metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Skewed text. Worn, damaged pages and cover.
